attributes.content: The Ember Inspector is a browser add-on designed to help you understand and debug your Ember applications. You can install it on [Google Chrome](installation/#toc_google-chrome), [Firefox](installation/#toc_firefox) and [other browsers](installation/#toc_via-bookmarklet) (via a bookmarklet) Here's a brief video showcasing some of the features of the Inspector:
